text: Hvidovre Idr√¶tsforening, mostly known as Hvidovre IF () is a Danish professional football club. It is from Hvidovre. The club is in the Danish Superliga. It plays its home matches at the Hvidovre Stadion. The club was made in 1925. They have been crowned Danish champions three times, in 1966, 1973 and 1981. They won the Danish Cup in 1980. Category:Danish football clubs Category:1925 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in Denmark
title: Hvidovre IF
